entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Buffers work planned for .NET 8 #79006
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Intrinsics work planned for .NET 8 #79005
    8.0.0
  • System.Numerics work planned for .NET 8 #79004
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 Native AOT Perf Improvements #79003
    8.0.0
  • ServiceCollection.Configure<ConcurrentDictionary<string, T>>(IConfigurationSection) fails in NET7 #78994
  • [API Proposal]: Efficient EndPoint serialization #78993
  • [wasm] Compilation with WasmBuildNative fails with dependency containing hyphen in the name #78992
    8.0.0
  • NullReferenceException when you use the short format of string.format $"{sample}" #78991
  • Make `ConnectCallback` more user friendly #78989
  • ServicePointManager and legacy APIs such as HttpWebRequest #78987
  • Qustion: How does TryParse decide what to return when there are multiple matching values: #78985
  • Generate Unsafe Span code for most of the looping #78981
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve some regex patterns in `MonoSDBHelper.cs` #78979
    8.0.0
  • Remove libraries folders that don't have src/*.cs files #78978
  • [wasm] V8 crash with AOT for `System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests` #78972
    8.0.0
  • Encoding between Internal.Console.Write and SystemNative_Log not aligned for iOS #78971
  • Null ignoring at SelectElements from System.Text.Json at JsonDocumentPathExtensions #78963
  • High netcore memory usage compared to windows (From an VS Template starter app) #78962
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringEquality #78969
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 4 Regressions on 11/23/2022 5:21:28 AM #78980
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Uri #78975
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Matrix4x4 #78977
    8.0.0
  • Multiple 'System.OutOfMemoryException' errors in .NET 7 #78959
    8.0.0
  • ssl certificate processing logic error #78957
  • The createdump tool creates double crash dumps when running in a Linux container on Kubernetes #78956
  • IL instruction: ldtoken(method) compiles incorrectly at PublishAOT. #78955
  • Publish Error In Using Japanese Char Account #78953
  • Test failure: Interop\\COM\\ComWrappers\\WeakReference\\WeakReferenceTest\\WeakReferenceTest.cmd #78945
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Incompatible types for gtNewTempAssign"' #78944
    8.0.0
  • dotnet EXE application doesn't work with shebang on Linux #78941
  • Debugging execution code in vs is slow, but the program is compiled and runs fine #78940

Closed

  • API Proposal: Add OffsetMinutes to DateTimeOffset #52081
    8.0.0
  • Make Math/MathF.Sign inlineable for floating point data #57413
  • Feature request: Inline Breakpoint support in Visual Studio #78932
  • Debuggin Blazor Webassembly project of Visual Studio 2022 does not work correctly with a Visual Basic Library .NET 6 or .NET Standard Project containing Async method. #77481
    8.0.0
  • Blazor client debugger incorrectly reading object values as null #77031
  • Severe degradation of JsonNode.Parse in net 7 ? #78966
  • The Jit doesn't handle certain uses of field addresses correctly #77636
    8.0.0
  • Cannot debug Blazor Webassembly on Chromium. #78907
  • AssemblyLoadContext unload not work if i use dynamic keywords(Microsoft.CSharp.dll) in Loaded Assembly #78952
  • Is there a built-in implementation of StartsWith and EndsWith for byte[]/Span<byte>/Memory<byte>? #78950
  • Equivalent to WebRequestHandler in .NET 6 #76977
  • Build mono+libs for browser on windows failed with UnicodeDecodeError. #78947
  • JIT: Fold constant access to [ReadOnly]Span<T> especially for char and byte #64823
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Correctly escape library names when generating symbols for .c #79007
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Don't gitignore linker #79002
  • [JIT] - Fix blocking CI IL test #78999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Add IndexOfAnyValues.Contains #78996
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove FILEDosToUnixPathA conversion #78995
    breaking-change, area-PAL-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Unify BufferedFileStreamStrategy seeking #78984
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] ActiveIssue: JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes - System.ObjectDisposedException #78976
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Internal.Console.Write uses unicode encoding for iOS #78974
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix issue with last_gc_before_oom flag being reset by intervening gen 1 GC. #78973
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Avoid dereferencing null if the debugger APIs are called before initializing the AppDomain #78970
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove usage of AT_EXECFN #78958
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add readmes for @dotnet/area-extensions-filesystem #78954
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Fix compiling EXE modules as native libraries #78949
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix configuration binding with types implementing IDictionary<,> #78946
    area-Extensions-Configuration

Merged

  • Implement DateTimeOffset.TotalOffsetMinutes #78943
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0][PERF]Fix Mono Dotnet Generation #78413
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.2
  • [6.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78670
    Servicing-approved, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 6.0.13
  • Remove single-stage-pipeline-with-resources.yml, use only pipeline-with-resources.yml #78968
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete .NET Native leftovers from type loader (part 1 of X) #78960
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Make sure s_currentGenerationTable is safe for profiler attach #78937
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] Disable mark phase prefetching for segments #78925
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] This fixes Github issue 78206 - a heap corruption problem associated with mark stack overflow #78855
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] Tar: Remove invalidation of whitespace in PAX extended attributes #78785
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78779
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] propagate aborted startup to top most promise #78764
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Disable AOTing methods which contain catch clauses insid… #78732
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] Update a few dependencies #78710
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.2
  • [7.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78669
    Servicing-approved, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] Fix commit accounting for large pages #78564
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #78470
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.2
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Handle delegates decorated with [UnmanagedFunctionPointe… #78426
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.2
  • Update branding to 6.0.13 #78982
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.2 #78983
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve fgGetStaticFieldSeqAndAddress #78961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Make mono dotnet pathing dynamic with proj file #78787
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix handling of conv_i in the interpreter #78948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Handle zero value modulus for OpenSSL 1.1 #78339
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix justMyCode behavior #78066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Improvements in debugging in async methods #78651
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Revert "Handle zero value modulus for OpenSSL 1.1" #78986
    area-System.Security
  • Use `FIELD_ADDR` for all `ldflda`s #78226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make DAC logging opt-in #77923
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Catch error from loading "node:crypto" module #78916
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use string interpolation in more places #78920
    area-Meta
  • Fix nullable annotation on Path.EndsInDirectorySeparator(string) #78922
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [Test][Mono] Remove extra "Build" from display name for build lanes #78942
    area-Infrastructure
  • Extend regex [x, x+64) char class optimization to [x, x+32) #78900
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Replace more Unsafe.As usage with pointers #78919
    area-Meta
  • Change the default SuperPMI collection location #78513
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fold const RVA access (via const index) #78783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [Release/6.0] Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource (#78213) #79008
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [Release/7.0] Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource (#78213) #79009
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [Release/6.0][PERF] Fix perf repo branch setup target, tool build, and mono-dotnet create #78411
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.13
  • Allow inlining in some over-bugdet cases #78874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 #78247
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.14
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2056136 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 3 #78782
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Aging dependent handles #78746
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Place frozen objects into dehydrated section #78688
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Place dispatch cells in dehydrated section #78748
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Fix to move to using GC pal within coreclr on Linux #78521
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #78532
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Use "node:crypto" to polyfill getRandomValues on older node #78766
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.3
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Add support for compiling sequentially #67483
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78420
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [WIP] Alternative fix for GC pal linking (without the size_t related change for MacOS) #78792
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Generate diagnosable failfast in GVM resolution #78936
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • Split library and package Readme #78888
    area-Meta, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add readmes for @dotnet/area-system-io #78935
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][mt] making JSImport work on worker thread #78847
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix initblk/cpblk and STORE_DYN_BLK size mismatch #78930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Transform `STRUCT`-typed uses of primitives in local morph #78131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update to the stable 7.0.100 SDK (WIP) #78034
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove instances of `%S` #78894
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Do not overallocate SocketAddress.Buffer #78860
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix ds-ipc-pal-socket.c Windows build. #77840
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fold some HW nodes for constant input #78929
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • JIT: Support GT_SELECT on xarch #78879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable basic Kept validation in NativeAOT running linker tests #78828
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Add .NET 7 source gen regression tests #78857
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix response file parsing and repro package creation #78924
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #78918
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [Android] Remove repeated calls to beginHandshake #78849
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Remove span pinning associated with string.Create #78914
  • Consolidate approach for conditional tests that check for privileged processes #78793
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Fix non-determinism in Type.IsAssignableTo #78939
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add some perf tests and don't spin-wait on a task when on a green thread #2105
    area-green-threads

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to 17/12/21 #2101
  • Allow return merging; implement mismatched returns #2104

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor task ran into copy failure. #29289
  • Avoid packaging patched assemblies that are part of the framework #29280
  • Update repo to use `Newtonsoft.Json` 13.0.2 #29269
  • Enable plugin support in dotnet tool #29268
  • A problem occurs when you customize a template #29265
  • Setting PublishSingleFile in the project can affect output assembly type #29263
  • dotnet tool install does not include all the files in .nupkg #29262

Closed

  • Error, warn, or fix behavior when specifying output path when building a solution #15607
    7.0.2xx
  • Create 7.0 project using terminal and run the project using https, the url can't opened. #29246

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29290
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the correct nuget.config file and remove a bunch of extra sources #29288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet nuget commands show correct help text #29266
    Area-CLI
  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix stabilize package version for 7.0.2xx #29281
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines (#29093) #29119
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines (#29093) #29120
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the desktop test projects #28932
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #29095
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29040
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29041
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.308 #29285
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.405 #29286
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve build stability by ensuring we aren't double publishing everywhere #29182
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove tmp from the default includes for tests #29180
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29036
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.13
  • Update branding to 7.0.102 #29287
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.113 #29284
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.2xx] inverted language version conditions in console / classlib templates to support new language features for newer language versions #29270
    Area-Common templates
  • Deploy watch to redist #29257
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch

Updated

  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Document for breaking changes, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External, Servicing-consider
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2055697 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add base class for all test classes using WatchableApp. #29258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.3
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29158

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • ref Switch Expression #6758

Updated

  • [Proposal Question]: Required member support for `MemberNotNull` #6754

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update params-span.md based on working group #6747
  • Nullability improvements notes 2022-11-22 #6756

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Property initializer with dependent property does not warn of possible null reference. #65658
  • Fully-Qualify fixer serializes symbols as part of normal processsing. #65652

Closed

  • Request: make SymbolDisplayCompilerInternalOptions public #4304
    Backlog
  • Add more Go To Def telemetry #65427
  • Fix-All for analyzers marked as syntax-only still computes semantics. #65477
    17.5
  • Discussion: Provide an easier way to add MetaDataReferences from Types #65627

PullRequests

Created

  • Add feature flag to allow diagnostic tagging to be either push or pull. #65671
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65667
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do all work for the 'fully qualify' fixer out of process. #65665
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup keyword recommender tests #65664
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [Test] Revert 65588 #65662
    Area-IDE
  • [Test] Revert 65590 #65661
    Area-IDE
  • [Test] Revert "Merge pull request #65583 from mavasani/DiagnosticAnalyzerSer… #65660
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65657
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Add Rename In File Telemetry #65668
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P2

Updated

  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics #65571
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #65642
    Area-Compilers
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65587
    Area-Compilers
  • Move some severity configurations to globalconfig #65274
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Revert "Merge pull request #63858 from CyrusNajmabadi/pullDiags" #65538
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • Move SRM to 6.0.1 #65416
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.5
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #65606
    Area-Compilers
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup `SyntaxNormalizerTests` #65516
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix generation of parameter symbols with explicit default values #65639
    Area-IDE
  • Allow optional and `params` parameters in synthesized delegate templates #65582
    Area-Compilers
  • Rules missing documentation #62242
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Minor cleanup in OptionStore #65450
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove IISAuthenticationHandler as suggested by existing comments #45355
  • There is a performance issue with WeatherForecastController.cs #45353
    Discussions
  • How should I handle OIDC callbacks when responseType=none? #45351
  • Add option to RedisCache to pass which field to save data in redis. #45350
  • Perf regression: json_nodejs, plaintext, plaintext, plaintext_nodejs #45348
  • .NET 8 Feature Request: Ability to scope CSS styles to a specific instance of a component #45347
  • Unable to read request body after request.EnableBuffering #45340
  • Unable to remove Output Cache defaults #45339
  • DateTimeOffset modelbinding from form is always set to utc in net7 #45338
  • Create 7.0 project using terminal and run the project using https, the url can't opened. #45336

Closed

  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #44627
    8.0-preview1
  • OIDC NonceCookie/CorrelationCookie not accepted by latest Chrome/Edge in some cases #44853
    8.0-preview1
  • Full page flash when loading a prerendered page that uses lazy loading #25731
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [NETE2ESDK]With NET 7.0.0 windows server hosting installed, the hyperlink for "here" on installer UI is 6.0 link not 7.0 link. #44615
  • [NETE2ESDK][Loc]In NET 7.0.0 installation bundle help, there are a few truncated strings. #44618
  • Caching: Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis doesn't provide createifnotexist method #45268
  • Razor pages in a Blazor application not rendering conditionally displayed components in DN7 #45343
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #45328
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #45329
  • Grpc.JsonTranscoding requires manually copying annotations.proto and http.proto into projects #43376
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ReturnUrl not working on Blazor WASM after OIDC login #45321
  • Consider adding id property to the Blazor WASM manifest.json file #45239
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Automate setting milestone for servicing PRs when merged #45356
    area-infrastructure
  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45354
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Warn the user if they're specifying protocols that won't be used #45352
    area-runtime
  • Update OIDC sample #45349
    area-security
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor][debugging] Support Debug on Chromium #45341
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0.3
  • Adding json output option to ListCommand #45335
    area-commandlinetools

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.13 #45345
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 7.0.2 #45346
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor][debugging] Support Debug on Chromium #45308
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • gRPC JSON transcoding - msbuild includes proto dependencies #44999
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview1
  • Adding id to manifest.json files #45269
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Centralize well known types across analyzers #45314
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22578.8 #44925
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Element.ChildRemoved event has wrong sender #11720
    Backlog

    Backlog

Closed

  • it looks like the webpage at https:/0.0.0.0/ might be having issues #8613
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ToolbarItems do not work correctly on Windows #11639
  • VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups - Unique name #11701
  • Buttons behind "Pop-Up" are handling taps in Android, which is different than Windows behavior (and Xamarin) #11663
  • How to customize the default installation path of packaged programs #11728
  • Get native Window handle from control #11718
  • Binding does not work for Platform dependent Behaviors #11729
  • Grid View Row is not working as expected #9458
    Backlog
  • Change IOS App Icon #11722
  • Thread safe issues about PathFigureCollectionConverter #11321

  • [WinUI] Fix RefreshView crash if no content is specified #11735
  • [6.0-sr8] Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Build] Remove unused variable #11727

Merged

  • Using local function to fix multi-thread issues #11497

Updated
